items.title: Trello
items.subtitle: A web-based, Kanban-style, list-making application and is a subsidiary of Atlassian.

items.title: Jira
items.subtitle: A proprietary issue tracking product developed by Atlassian that allows bug tracking and agile project management.

items.title: Confluence
items.subtitle: A web-based corporate wiki developed by Atlassian

items.title: Slack
items.subtitle: A proprietary business communication platform offering many IRC-style features
